description:
In the depths of Kariya`s mansion, Ichigo faces off against Maki Ichinose, a soul reaper formerly of Squad 11.  But before he can cast the final blow on Ichigo, Kariya steps in and approaches Ichigo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Disparition de la rancune ! Le Shinigami que Kenpachi a tué !
Kienu Onnen! Kenpachi ga Kitta Shinigami
Unquellable Hatred! The Shinigami that Kenpachi Cut Down
消えぬ怨念! 剣八が斬った死神
